comments:
I have a big project and when AspectJ Builder is weaving still many time with 0%(more than 15 minutes).
When I cancel the weaving process, ajdt throw this exception below:
------------------------------------------
java.util.EmptyStackException
at java.util.Stack.peek(Stack.java:79)
at org.aspectj.ajdt.internal.core.builder.AsmHierarchyBuilder.genBytecodeInfo(AsmHierarchyBuilder.java:554)

----------------------------------------------
Please could you provide the following information to help us narrow this down:
 - The version of eclipse you are using
 - The build of AJDT (under Help > About > AJ)
 - Open the Event Trace view (Window > Show View > Other > AspectJ), and paste the lines leading up to the slow down/hang here.
Please can you see if this is still a problem with the latest builds (currently AJDT 1.4.0.dev on Eclipse 3.2RC4). If so please reopen with the info requested above.
